articles.author: Taylor & Francis
articles.title: Mystery of 'very odd' elasmosaur finally solved: One of North America's most famous fossils identified as new species - Phys.org
articles.description: A group of fossils of elasmosaurs—some of the most famous in North America—have just been formally identified as belonging to a "very odd" new genus of the sea monster, unlike any previously known.
articles.content:
